thread.section_title: Hotel Le Walt - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exemplary service to attention and accommodation
thread.title_full: Exemplary service to attention and accommodation - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: abloome
title: Exemplary service to attention and accommodation
text: This was my third time staying at LeWalt for business purposes and I would highly recommend this reasonably priced boutique hotel in a pleasant neighborhood near the Eiffel Tower for business or personal travel. As in the past, the staff went over and beyond in their graciousness and consideration in supporting my work- and personal accommodation requests. My room was quite pleasant, sizeable, and sufficiently quiet for me to get work done and sleep well. The breakfast and happy hour food were quite tasty. The front desk and breakfast attendants were courteous and helpful.
